notes.title: Funding
notes.p: YBA received grant number PT-AABN1199 from the Foundation for Innovative New Diagnostics ( https://www.finddx.org). This was a sub-award from a grant FIND received from Paul G. Allen Philanthropies ( http://www.pgaphilanthropies.org). FIND played a role in study design, implementation, and analysis. Paul G. Allen Philanthropies played no role in any part of the study (including study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript).
